title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 113 - Powers And Duties Of New York City Board Of Education In Determining Certain Appeals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 113 - Powers And Duties Of New York City Board Of Education In Determining Certain Appeals

State Regulations
§ 113.1 - Definitions
§ 113.2 - Appeal from chancellor's order by community board or any suspended or removed member
§ 113.3 - Filing an appeal
§ 113.4 - Parties
§ 113.5 - Representation
§ 113.6 - Amicus curiae
§ 113.7 - Temporary stay
§ 113.8 - Appeal papers
§ 113.9 - Contents of statement of appeal
§ 113.10 - Time and contents of answer
§ 113.11 - Reply
§ 113.12 - Names of parties or counsel endorsed on all papers
§ 113.13 - Extensions of time to answer or reply
§ 113.14 - Effect of saturday, sundays and holidays
§ 113.15 - Verification of appeal papers
§ 113.16 - Service of appeal papers, applications and amicus curiae papers
§ 113.17 - Filing of orders, appeal papers and applications
§ 113.18 - Oaths
§ 113.19 - Consideration and determination of appeal
§ 113.20 - Expedited procedure
§ 113.21 - Oral argument
§ 113.22 - Administrative notice of city board records and reports
§ 113.23 - Final determination
§ 113.24 - Dismissal of appeal
§ 113.25 - Appeal to commissioner of education
§ 113.26 - Duties of secretary of city board

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 113

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§207, 2590-g

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
